hexagrams.name: Ch'ien (The Creative)
hexagrams.judgement: The Creative works sublime success, furthering through perseverance.
hexagrams.image: The movement of heaven is full of power. Thus the superior man makes himself strong and untiring.

changing_lines.line_2: Dragon appearing in the field. It furthers one to see the great man.
changing_lines.line_3: All day long the superior man is creatively active.
changing_lines.line_4: Wavering flight over the depths. No blame.
changing_lines.line_5: Flying dragon in the heavens. It furthers one to see the great man.
changing_lines.line_6: Arrogant dragon will have cause to repent.

hexagrams.advice: Be strong and persevere in your actions.
hexagrams.interpretation: Ch'ien is about creative power and initiative. It advises being strong and persevering.

hexagrams.name: Wei Chi (Before Completion)
hexagrams.judgement: Before Completion. Success. It furthers one to be cautious and to prepare.
hexagrams.image: Water over fire: the image of Before Completion.

changing_lines.line_1: The fish is caught in the net. No blame.
changing_lines.line_2: The fish is caught in the net. Good fortune.
changing_lines.line_3: The fish is caught in the net. Misfortune.
changing_lines.line_4: The fish is caught in the net. Good fortune.
changing_lines.line_5: The fish is caught in the net. Good fortune.
changing_lines.line_6: The fish is caught in the net. Misfortune.

hexagrams.advice: Be prepared for transitions and remain cautious.
hexagrams.interpretation: Wei Chi represents the state of being before completion. It advises careful preparation and awareness of transitions.
